column1: Road traffic (vehicle miles) by vehicle type in Great Britain, annual from 1949 to 2011
1 Not exceeding 3,500 kgs gross vehicle weight, post 1982
2 Over 3,500 kgs gross vehicle weight, post 1982
3 Data for 1993 onwards are not directly comparable with the figures for 1992 and earlier

4.The 2011 estimates presented here were revised in August 2012 to correct for omitted data for a small number of sections of the major road network in Scotland. Further details are avaliable at  http://dft.gov.uk/statistics/series/traffic/ 2011 Road Traffic Estimates - Note of Revision Aug 2012.pdf
The figures in this table are National Statistics.
column9: Source: DfT National Road Traffic Survey
